welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marica, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all the city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Santos Dumont Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Galeao Antonio Carlos Jobim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights, but also serves some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Galeao Antonio Carlos Jobim Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in certain areas.
